Package com.advertisementproject.userservice.api.controller

Class RegistrationController

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.userservice.api.controller.RegistrationController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/register/")
public class RegistrationController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller for registering new users either as a customer user or company user. Sends messages to other microservices to inform them that a user has been registered.

  • Method Details

    • registerCustomer

      @PostMapping("customer") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomerUserResponse> registerCustomer​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid CustomerRegistrationRequest registrationRequest)
      Endpoint for registering a customer user. Validates that required fields are not null, registers a customer user and then sends messages to Confirmation Token Service application and Email Service application.
      Parameters:
      registrationRequest - registration request object including all information needed to register a new user.
      Returns:
      Response entity including the newly created user object and related customer object

    • registerCompany

      @PostMapping("company") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CompanyUserResponse> registerCompany​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid CompanyRegistrationRequest registrationRequest)
      Endpoint for registering a company user. Validates that required fields are not null, registers a company user and then sends messages to Confirmation Token Service application and Email Service application.
      Parameters:
      registrationRequest - registration request object including all information needed to register a new user.
      Returns:
      Response entity including the newly created user object and related company object

    • resendEmail

      @GetMapping("resend-email/{email}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> resendEmail​(@PathVariable java.lang.String email)
      Endpoint for sending a new confirmation link email to the supplied email. Retrieves email details related to the user that has that email address, then sends out messages to Confirmation Token Service application and Email Service application so a new confirmation token can be created and a new email sent to the user.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address to retrieve email details from and send an email to.
      Returns:
      Response entity with the message that a new email has been sent.
